thread.title: Myrtis Jackson

author: Myrtis Jackson
title: Myrtis Jackson
text: The descriptions of the books condition was very accurate. The books were packaged very well. They all arrived in great condition. The books were in great condition as far as I am concerned. I like that all books were from this one site. It was very covenant for me make one payment and they did the rest. The variety of books was awesome. I would definitely purchase from Biblio.com again and I would recommend them to my family and friends. Thank you Bibliophile for being there and may God continue to bless and expand your mission.
